redo_tooltip: Redo the last command that was undone
toggleMultiMode_tooltip: Multi selection mode. Work with Tweak
toggleOrtho_tooltip: Change between orthogonal view or perspective view
body_status: Object ${this.name} has ${this.polygonSize} polygons, ${this.edgeSize} edges, and ${this.vertexSize} vertices
geometryBackground_tooltip: Background color of the Geometry window
vertexDisplay_tooltip: Change how vertices are normally displayed
unselectedSize_tooltip: Size in pixels of unselected vertices (0.0 = not shown)
selectedSize_tooltip: Size in pixels of selected vertices
magnetVertexSize_tooltip: Size in pixels of magnet mask vertices
edgeDisplay_tooltip: Change how edges are normally displayed
unselectedWidth_tooltip: Width in pixels of unselected edges
selectedWidth_tooltip: Width in pixels of selected edges
hardEdgeWidth_tooltip: Width in pixels of hard edges
highlighting_tooltip: Change how mouse-over highlighting is normally displayed
unselected_tooltip: Color for highlighting of items which are not yet selected
selected_tooltip: Color for highlighting of items which are already selected
selection_tooltip: Change how selected items are normally displayed
selectionColor_tooltip: Color for items currently selected (but not currently highlighted by mouse-over)
informationText_tooltip: Change how the Status Bar shown in Geometry windows is normally displayed. (Note: the Information Line options are in the User Interface tab)
infoText_tooltip: Color of text in the Status Bar
infoBackground_tooltip: Color of background for Status Bar
infoVerbose_tooltip: Show additional information (if available) about the selected items
normalDisplay_tooltip: Change how Normals are displayed; see [View | Show | Show Normals] which toggles display of normals
normalLength_tooltip: Length in wings units of normals
material_tooltip: Change how materials are displayed in the normal Wings 3D workspace
axes_tooltip: Change the way the Axes are displayed
axesToGrid_tooltip: Limit the display of the axes to within the ground-plane grid area, instead of out to 'infinity'
miniAxis_tooltip: Display the moving Mini Axes in the bottom left of the Geometry window. This option is independent of the display of the main axes, see [View | Show | Axes]
xPlusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard X axe, in positive direction
yPlusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard Y axe, in positive direction
zPlusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard Z axe, in positive direction
xMinusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard X axe, in negative direction
yMinusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard Y axe, in negative direction
zMinusColor_tooltip: Color of the standard Z axe, in negative direction
grid_tooltip: Change the way the ground plane is displayed
gridColor_tooltip: Color of the ground-plane grid lines
forceAAGrid_tooltip: Always show the grid when the view is aligned along one of the major axes, regardless of current [View | Show | Ground Plane] setting
forceAAOrtho_tooltip: Always go into Orthographic mode when the view is aligned along one of the major axes (see X, Y, Z Hotkeys) regardless of current [View | Orthographic] setting
cameraPref_tooltip: Wings3D assumes a Three Button Scroll Mouse, and Wings3D Camera Mode
mouseButtons_tooltip: Set the option to One, Two or (the default) Three button mouse
cameraMode_tooltip: Camera mode and behavior. Linked to the number of mouse buttons.  The default is Wings 3D. Nendo camera mode can be used with a one- or two-button mouse, and Blender camera mode can be used with a two- or three-button mouse. All other camera modes require a three-button mouse
rotationSpeed_tooltip: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to rotate the scene
panSpeed_tooltip: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to pan the scene
keyPanSpeed_tooltip: Step size in pixels moved when the Arrow keys are used to pan the scene
scrollWheel_tooltip: Change the speed and behavior of zooming using a scroll wheel
wheelZoom_tooltip: Use the scroll wheel to zoom
aimZoom_tooltip: Enables auto aiming while zooming the camera in when part of the model is highlighted
zoomFactor_tooltip: Percentage change in size of scene when zooming in/out
altZoomFactor_tooltip: Alternative zoom factor setting, to give a choice of (slower) zooming behavior
unidirectionalCamera_tooltip: Allows use of the scroll wheel to Pan in one direction (with Ctrl+Scroll) or Rotate (with Shift+Scroll) around one axis. The Alt key is used to pan/rotate in the opposite direction. This feature is an alternative to tumbling and dragging using mouse movements in camera mode
wheelPanRotate_tooltip: Switch on use of scroll wheel for unidirectional camera mode
infoLineHelpString_tooltip: Display the additional options in the Information Line
panSpeed_tooltip: Step size in pixels moved when the scroll wheel is used to pan the scene
rotationStepDegree_tooltip: Step size in degrees when the scroll wheel is used to rotate the scene
interfacePref_tooltip: Chose different colors and transparency settings for the workspace
colors_tooltip: Change the appearance of the workspace
geometryBackground_tooltip: Background color of the Geometry windows
menubarBackground_tooltip: Background color of the Main Menu
menubarText_tooltip: Color of the Main Menu text
menuBackground_tooltip: Background color of the Context Menu
menuText_tooltip: Color of the Context Menu text
menuHighlight_tooltip: Background color of a selected command in a Context Menu
menuHighlightText_tooltip: Color of the text of a selected command in a Context Menu
infoLineBackground_tooltip: Background color of the Information Line
infoLineText_tooltip: Color of the text in the Information Line
interfaceIcon_tooltip: Choose the style of the Menu Toolbar Icons
advancedMiscPref_tooltip: Ragbag of useful options which have nowhere else to go
vectorLength_tooltip: Length of vector in wings units of secondary selections
vectorWidth_tooltip: Width in pixels of selected vector
clippingPlaneIndicator_tooltip: Change how Clipping Plane are displayed
dragPreference_tooltip: Allows you to customize mouse sensitivity/speed during distance, scaling and rotation dragging operations
mouseDraggingSpeed_tooltip: Set relative speed for distance mouse motion
mouseScalingSpeed_tooltip: Set relative speed for scaling mouse motion
mouseRotatingSpeed_tooltip: Set relative speed for rotation mouse motion
autoRotate_tooltip: Default settings for the Auto Rotate camera view (U Hotkey)
dealy_tooltip: Speed of rotation, which can be changed by +/- while rotating
